code: import{useState}from'react';import{supabase}from'../lib/supabase';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function ChangePassword(){const[newPassword,setNewPassword]=useState('');const[message,setMessage]=useState('');const handleChangePassword=async e=>{e.preventDefault();setMessage('');const{error}=await supabase.auth.updateUser({password:newPassword});if(error)setMessage(error.message);else setMessage('Password updated successfully!');setNewPassword('');};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleChangePassword,className:"mb-4",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{className:"block mb-1 font-semibold",children:"Change Admin Password"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"password",value:newPassword,onChange:e=>setNewPassword(e.target.value),placeholder:"New password",className:"border px-3 py-2 rounded w-full mb-2",required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",className:"bg-black text-gold px-4 py-2 rounded font-bold",children:"Change Password"}),message&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"mt-2 text-sm",children:message})]});}export default ChangePassword;
